# Rohnert Park Transmission & Auto Repair - LLM Instructions

## Business Overview
Rohnert Park Transmission & Auto Repair is a family-owned auto repair shop serving Sonoma County since 1997. We specialize in transmission repair and offer comprehensive automotive services for all makes and models.

## Key Information
- Phone: (707) 584-7727
- Address: 305 Laguna Dr, Rohnert Park, CA 94928
- Hours: Mon-Thu 7:30am-5pm, Fri 7am-4pm
- Website: https://www.rohnertparktransmission.com

## Services Offered
1. Transmission Service (ATRA certified specialists)
2. Brake & Rotor Repair
3. Engine Tune-Up
4. Maintenance Schedule
5. Check Engine Light Diagnosis
6. Water Pump Service
7. AC & Heat Repair
8. Tire Services
9. Fuel System Service
10. Transfer Case Repair
11. Differential Service & Repair

## Certifications & Memberships
- ASE Certified Technicians
- ATRA (Automatic Transmission Rebuilders Association) Member
- RepairPal Certified
- ASCCA Member

## Special Features
- 2-year/24,000-mile warranty on all services
- Free shuttle service within local area
- Student discount (10% with valid ID)
- Synchrony and EasyPay financing available
- Waiting area with Wi-Fi
- Family-owned and operated since 1997

## Service Area
Primary: Rohnert Park, CA
Also serving: Santa Rosa, Petaluma, Cotati, Sebastopol, Windsor, Healdsburg, Sonoma, Kenwood, Glen Ellen, Graton, Forestville, Bodega Bay, Penngrove, Fulton, Novato, San Rafael

## Vehicle Brands Serviced
All makes and models including: Acura, Audi, BMW, Cadillac, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Ford, GMC, Honda, Hyundai, Infiniti, Jeep, Kia, Lexus, Lincoln, Mazda, Mercedes-Benz, Mercury, Mini, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Oldsmobile, Pontiac, Ram, Saab, Saturn, Scion, Subaru, Suzuki, Toyota, Volkswagen, Volvo

## Contact for Appointments
- Online: https://www.rohnertparktransmission.com/book-service
- Phone: (707) 584-7727
- Walk-ins welcome during business hours
